description: Questions and answers on the scale of the outbreak and the science of the Ebola virus.
title: How Many Ebola Patients Have Been Treated Outside of Africa?
title_page: How Many Ebola Patients Have Been Treated Outside of Africa? - The New York Times
maintext: Note: On Sept. 30, officials with the federal Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said Mr. Duncan first went to the hospital on Sept. 26. On Oct. 1, the Texas Health Presbyterian Hospital issued a statement that he first arrived there after 10 p.m. on Sept. 25.
